variable.name: ccpp_error_message
variable.long_name: error message for error handling in CCPP

variable.name: ccpp_error_flag
variable.long_name: error flag for error handling in CCPP

variable.name: ccpp_loop_counter
variable.long_name: loop counter for subcycling loops in CCPP

variable.name: flag_for_ruc_land_surface_scheme
variable.long_name: flag for RUC land surface model

variable.name: do_mynnsfclay
variable.long_name: flag to activate MYNN surface layer

variable.name: soil_vertical_dimension_for_land_surface_model
variable.long_name: number of soil layers internal to land surface model

variable.name: depth_of_soil_levels_for_land_surface_model
variable.long_name: depth of soil levels for land surface model

variable.name: specific_heat_of_dry_air_at_constant_pressure
variable.long_name: specific heat !of dry air at constant pressure

variable.name: pi
variable.long_name: ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter

variable.name: gas_constant_dry_air
variable.long_name: ideal gas constant for dry air

variable.name: gas_constant_water_vapor
variable.long_name: ideal gas constant for water vapor

variable.name: ratio_of_vapor_to_dry_air_gas_constants_minus_one
variable.long_name: rv/rd - 1 (rv = ideal gas constant for water vapor)

variable.name: water_equivalent_accumulated_snow_depth
variable.long_name: water equiv of acc snow depth over land and sea ice

variable.name: surface_snow_thickness_water_equivalent
variable.long_name: water equivalent snow depth over land

variable.name: ratio_of_snowfall_to_rainfall
variable.long_name: snow ratio: ratio of snow to total precipitation

variable.name: x_wind_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: zonal wind at lowest model layer

variable.name: y_wind_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: meridional wind at lowest model layer

variable.name: air_pressure_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: mean pressure at lowest model layer

variable.name: surface_wind_enhancement_due_to_convection
variable.long_name: surface wind enhancement due to convection

variable.name: air_temperature_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: mean temperature at lowest model layer

variable.name: water_vapor_specific_humidity_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: water vapor specific humidity at lowest model layer

variable.name: cloud_condensed_water_mixing_ratio_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: moist (dry+vapor, no condensates) mixing ratio of cloud water at lowest model layer

variable.name: surface_downwelling_longwave_flux
variable.long_name: surface downwelling longwave flux at current time

variable.name: surface_downwelling_shortwave_flux
variable.long_name: surface downwelling shortwave flux at current time

variable.name: surface_net_downwelling_shortwave_flux
variable.long_name: surface net downwelling shortwave flux at current time

variable.name: wind_speed_at_lowest_model_layer
variable.long_name: wind speed at lowest model level

variable.name: surface_drag_mass_flux_for_heat_and_moisture_in_air
variable.long_name: surf h m exch coef time surf wind density

variable.name: surface_drag_wind_speed_for_momentum_in_air
variable.long_name: surf mom exch coef time mean surf wind

variable.name: vegetation_area_fraction
variable.long_name: areal fractional cover of green vegetation

variable.name: mean_vis_albedo_with_weak_cosz_dependency
variable.long_name: mean vis albedo with weak cosz dependency

variable.name: mean_nir_albedo_with_weak_cosz_dependency
variable.long_name: mean nir albedo with weak cosz dependency

variable.name: cloud_condensed_water_mixing_ratio_at_surface
variable.long_name: moist cloud water mixing ratio at surface

variable.name: water_vapor_mixing_ratio_at_surface
variable.long_name: water vapor mixing ratio at surface

variable.name: volume_fraction_of_condensed_water_in_soil_at_wilting_point
variable.long_name: soil water fraction at wilting point

variable.name: vegetation_type_classification
variable.long_name: vegetation type at each grid cell

variable.name: soil_type_classification
variable.long_name: soil type at each grid cell

variable.name: volume_fraction_of_soil_moisture_for_land_surface_model
variable.long_name: volumetric fraction of soil moisture for lsm

variable.name: volume_fraction_of_unfrozen_soil_moisture_for_land_surface_model
variable.long_name: volume fraction of unfrozen soil moisture for lsm

variable.name: volume_fraction_of_frozen_soil_moisture_for_land_surface_model
variable.long_name: volume fraction of frozen soil moisture for lsm

variable.name: soil_temperature_for_land_surface_model
variable.long_name: soil temperature for land surface model

variable.name: snow_temperature_bottom_first_layer
variable.long_name: snow temperature at the bottom of first snow layer

variable.name: total_accumulated_snowfall
variable.long_name: run-total snow accumulation on the ground

variable.name: accumulated_water_equivalent_of_frozen_precip
variable.long_name: snow water equivalent of run-total frozen precip

variable.name: kinematic_surface_upward_sensible_heat_flux
variable.long_name: kinematic surface upward sensible heat flux

variable.name: snow_deposition_sublimation_upward_latent_heat_flux
variable.long_name: latent heat flux from snow depo/subl

variable.name: minimum_vegetation_area_fraction
variable.long_name: min fractional coverage of green vegetation

variable.name: maximum_vegetation_area_fraction
variable.long_name: max fractional coverage of green vegetation

variable.name: flag_for_first_time_step
variable.long_name: flag signaling first time step for time integration loop

variable.name: ccpp_error_message
variable.long_name: error message for error handling in CCPP

variable.name: ccpp_error_flag
variable.long_name: error flag for error handling in CCPP

variable.name: iounit_namelist
variable.long_name: fortran unit number for file opens

variable.name: ccpp_error_message
variable.long_name: error message for error handling in CCPP

variable.name: ccpp_error_flag
variable.long_name: error flag for error handling in CCPP
